verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Joy to the world! the Lord is come; newline Let earth receive her King. newline Let every heart prepare Him room, newline And heav'n and nature sing, newline And heav'n and nature sing, newline And heav'n and heav'n and nature sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Joy to the earth! the Savior reigns; newline Let men their songs employ. newline While fields and floods, newline Rocks, hills and plains, newline Repeat the sounding joy, newline Repeat the sounding joy, newline Repeat, repeat the sounding joy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: No more let sins and sorrows grow, newline Nor thorns infest the ground. newline He comes to make His blessings flow, newline Far as the curse is found, newline Far as the curse is found, newline Far as, far as the curse is found.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He rules the world with truth and grace newline And makes the nations prove. newline The glories of His righteousness newline And wonders of His love, newline And wonders of His love, newline And wonders, and wonders of His love.
